s: November 20, 2023 - Transparency is an Amazon program ... for your brand (and customers) from counterfeiters. These are the steps involved when using Transparency: First, enroll your products in Transparency. Next, apply Transparency codes to your products. Then Amazon scans your products to ensure only authentic units are shipped to customers.
